import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get users associated with ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/users"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all users associated with a ticket, including the requester, assignees, followers, and other related users. Provides a comprehensive view of everyone involved with a ticket.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Get users: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/users](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-users)
3. Analyze: Review user roles and involvement
4. Take action: Add followers, reassign, or contact stakeholders as needed

**Response Fields**: Each user includes `UserId`, `Name`, `Email`, `Role` on the ticket (Requester, Owner, Follower, etc.), and user details.

**Query Parameters**: Supports pagination with `$p` (page index, default 0) and `$s` (page size, default 100).

**Use Cases**: Building user involvement reports, sending bulk notifications, auditing ticket access, identifying stakeholders for escalation.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-followers) – Just followers
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/teams](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-teams) – Teams involved
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/user/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-user) – Add user

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0}},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Page size (default 100)","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":100}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
